name: High Court of Justice of Catalonia

reviews.text: Very unusual architecture with all sorts of weird features.  An actual delight to see although a bit hard to get the whole picture.
Palace oh Justice in Barcelona. Very beautiful building with a nice example of architecture, it is not possible to go inside.
On the left as you walk down from the Arco de Trionfo towards Parc Ciutadella. Interesting turrets and skyline.
Could see this magnificent building from the rooftop of our hotel and it is even better close up, you are not allowed in for obvious reasons but well worth a quick view.
